thread.title: how many finished TC mods are there?

post.author: mavrik65
post.body: trying to keep track of TC mods is hard work there's so many I haven't heard of or just haven't been completed. So, I'm asking you as gamers to tell me what you think are the best total conversions for doom3. (finished ones by the way)

post.author: LDAsh
post.body:
"TC" is a funny term, the accurate answer is "none".

The Dark Mod has a playable release and that's about as total as it gets:-
http://www.mindplaces.com/darkmod/

Into Cerberon also counts as the gameplay is way off Doom3 enough:-
http://www.chmodoplusr.com/IntoCerberon/

post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body:
Bubba Lego-Tep

Daikatana 2: John Romero's Quest for GUD Doom 3 Daikatana (tm) TC Mod's Expansion Pack "Crucifix of Shit" (aka : D2JRQ4GD3DTCMEP"CoS")

Koranetics

post.author: KoRnScythe
post.body:
I believe in Bubba Lego-Tep.
A masterpiece that doesn't get the attention that it deserves.
